name: part_002
file: tmp_【#鷹嶺ルイ1周年LIVE】Growth ーこれが私の成長ー【3D LIVE】 [y-gW-iI1eAo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui performs the song 'Call Boy' by syudou.
MC section where Takane Lui talks about the performance and the theme of the live 'Growth'.

subtitles.original:
コールボーイ
作詞・作曲：syudou
subtitles.english:
Call Boy
Lyrics/Composition: syudou

subtitles.original: 半額一か八かのバー　凡庸な色取り自称非凡人
subtitles.english: A half-priced hit-or-miss bar, mediocre colors for a self-proclaimed extraordinary person

subtitles.original: 使い捨てしたいクズと　されたい輩で大繁盛
subtitles.english: Thriving with trash who want to use others, and those who want to be used

subtitles.original: 混ぜ物の目の安価なバボ　半端な貴方がよく似合う
subtitles.english: Cheap bubbles with mixed eyes, they suit half-baked you perfectly

subtitles.original: よだれも同じ事なんてのが　お決まりなんだけど
subtitles.english: Even drooling the same thing is common, but...

subtitles.original: 人は孤独を殺すため　虚しさを燃やすため
subtitles.english: People drink to kill their loneliness, to burn away the emptiness

subtitles.original: 酒を飲むんだ
subtitles.english: They drink alcohol

subtitles.original: 金も時間も感情も　なんでもやるからさ
subtitles.english: Money, time, even emotions, I'll give you everything

subtitles.original: 二人で酔いよ
subtitles.english: Let's get drunk together

subtitles.original:
良いとか悪いとか言うそれ以前に
俺には一切記憶がねぇんだよ
subtitles.english:
Before even saying if it's good or bad
I have no memory of it at all

subtitles.original: 明日もまた　猛弁解
subtitles.english: Tomorrow again, a fierce excuse

subtitles.original:
飲んだら明日に響くと云うけど
飲まなきゃその明日すらもねぇんだよ
subtitles.english:
They say if I drink it'll affect tomorrow
But if I don't drink, that tomorrow won't even exist

subtitles.original:
嫌になるぜ　もう一杯
DON'T STOP!
subtitles.english:
I'm sick of this, another glass
DON'T STOP!

subtitles.original: 構わずにもう一杯
subtitles.english: Without a care, another glass

subtitles.original: 明日行方今夜の便も　全部失くしてなお大繁盛
subtitles.english: Even after losing tomorrow's whereabouts and tonight's mail, business is booming

subtitles.original: プライド取り捨て助平　愛を偽るのは簡単だ
subtitles.english: Throwing away pride, a lecher, it's easy to fake love

subtitles.original: 人差し指で黙らして　一箇所略語前二神
subtitles.english: Silencing with a forefinger, one place abbreviated, the former two gods

subtitles.original: 結局いつもの事と　山ほどお仕舞なんだけど
subtitles.english: In the end, it's just the usual thing, and a mountain of ends, but...

subtitles.original: 人は誰もが偽善者さ　優しい嘘を餌に
subtitles.english: Everyone is a hypocrite, using kind lies as bait

subtitles.original: 狩りをするんだ
subtitles.english: To go hunting

subtitles.original: 血酒日の酒苦い酒　ねぇ優しくするからさ
subtitles.english: Blood sake, sun sake, bitter sake, hey, I'll be kind to you

subtitles.original: 一人は嫌だ
subtitles.english: I hate being alone

subtitles.original:
愛だの恋だのやんやと騒ぐが
酔ったら結局誰でもいいんだよ
subtitles.english:
They make a fuss about love and romance
But when they're drunk, anyone will do

subtitles.original: 荒ぶりて　暴言タイム
subtitles.english: Getting rowdy, verbal abuse time

subtitles.original:
その「誰でも」すら俺は選ばれず
泣くのもだせぇし酒を浴びんだよ
subtitles.english:
Even as that "anyone," I am not chosen
Crying is uncool, so I'll drench myself in alcohol

subtitles.original:
嫌になるぜ　もう一杯
CAN'T STOP!
subtitles.english:
I'm sick of this, another glass
CAN'T STOP!

subtitles.original: 意味も無くもう一杯
subtitles.english: Without any meaning, another glass

subtitles.original: 馬鹿と煙が梯子酒　昇る様はさながら蜘蛛の糸
subtitles.english: Fools and smoke bar-hop together, their ascent is like a spider's thread

subtitles.original: どこもかしこもクソだらけ　おい一番クソなのは
subtitles.english: Everywhere is full of shit, hey, the shittiest thing is...

subtitles.original: お前だ馬鹿
subtitles.english: ...you, you idiot

subtitles.original:
良いとか悪いとか言うそれ以前に
俺には一切記憶がねぇんだよ
subtitles.english:
Before even saying if it's good or bad
I have no memory of it at all

subtitles.original: 嫌になるぜ　もう限界
subtitles.english: I'm sick of this, I'm at my limit

subtitles.original:
飲んでもないのに難なく生きてる
アンタの方こそ呑まれてるんだよ
subtitles.english:
Even without drinking, you're living effortlessly
You're the one who's truly swallowed up

subtitles.original:
嫌になるぜ　もう一杯
WONT STOP
subtitles.english:
I'm sick of this, another glass
WONT STOP

subtitles.original: 死ぬ前にもう一杯
subtitles.english: Before I die, another glass

subtitles.original: はい、連続で3曲聞いていただきましたけど
subtitles.english: Yes, you've just heard three songs in a row

subtitles.original: いかがでしょうか？かっこよかった？
subtitles.english: How was it? Was it cool?

subtitles.original: お、コメントが流れてたな。
subtitles.english: Oh, the comments were flying by.

subtitles.original: おお、かっこいい！嬉しい。かっこよかった。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Oh, "cool"! I'm happy. "It was cool". Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 今日もね、見に来てくださってありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to watch today as well.

subtitles.original: ツイートね、こちらのハッシュタグ
subtitles.english: For tweets, please use this hashtag...

subtitles.original: 「#鷹嶺ルイ1周年LIVE」でね、呟いてくれると嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: ..."#鷹嶺ルイ1周年LIVE". I'd be happy if you'd tweet with it.

subtitles.original: ということで、凄く緊張しているんだけれども...
subtitles.english: So, I'm very nervous, but...

subtitles.original: おや？ちょっと見てくださいよ。このステージ。
subtitles.english: Oh? Please take a look at this stage.

subtitles.original: 鷹嶺ルイの特別仕様にしていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: It's been made into a special Takane Lui version!
